info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 9:30PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN CLEARFIELD AND SOUTHWESTERN CENTRE COUNTIES THROUGH 945 PM EDT... At 930 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles northwest of Tyrone, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Philipsburg, Osceola Mills, Chester Hill, Houtzdale, North Philipsburg, South Philipsburg, Sandy Ridge, Jeffries, Black Moshannon State Park, Morrisdale, Irvona, West Decatur, Coalport, Ramey, Brisbin and Glen Hope. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for central Pennsylvania.
